Running script for collecting, training, testing¶

run¶

This script collects data, train, and test classifiers.

scripts.run.collect_and_save_data(db_name='articles.db', table_name='home_article')[source]¶

Collects title & category data from the Gunosy websites

db_name: str
name of a db
table_name: str
name of a table
scripts.run.train_classifier()[source]¶

Trains classifiers with collected dataset that is saved in db and test with test data which is separated with train data
